Key Match Events: Harmeet Singh clobbered three sixes and two fours and forged a 60-run unbroken partnership with Corey Anderson, who also came good in the end, when it mattered most.
Post-Match Reflections: Player of the Match Harmeet Singh deservedly hitting the winning four.
Miscellaneous Highlights: USA stunned International Cricket Council (ICC) full-member Bangladesh by five wickets in the opening match of the three-match T20 International (T20I) series, here at the Prairie View Cricket Complex in Houston, Texas.
